population: Combined 4 samples: 2 undergraduate, 1 cardiac rehabilitation, 1 chronic pain

total.label: Total Score (Item Mean)
total.note: Items 1, 3, 5 positive; items 2, 4, 6 reverse-scored at item level before averaging.

clinicalCutoffs.note: These cutoffs are supplementary. Primary categorization uses T-score thresholds from norms-index.json.

tScoreExample.description: Student scores item-mean of 2.8 on BRS
tScoreExample.calculation: T = 50 + 10 × ((2.8 - 3.53) / 0.84) = 50 + 10 × (-0.87) = 41.3 → Needs Focus. Also below clinical cutoff of 3.0 = 'Low resilience'.
